question:
You recently bought a piece of equipment for your kitchen but it did not work. You phoned the shop but no action was taken.
Write a letter to the shop manager. In your letter:
•	describe the problem with the equipment
•	explain what happened when you phoned the shop
•	say what you would like the manager to do
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding the purchase of a chimney from your store and would like to bring to your notice the poor service that I received afterwards.

Last week, I bought a chimney from shop which was initially working fine. However, after one day, while it was running some strange noises came out and it stopped working. In shock and awe, I immediately called your helpdesk and the salesperson told me that the situation will be rectified within 72 hours; the complaint receipt number is enclosed with the letter. A week’s time has already passed without resolving the matter.
As a manager, I want you to either replace the item as it under warranty period or refund the whole amount. I am even ready to drive to your respective shop in order to hand you the chimney.
I hope to get a prompt response from your side.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase shop seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that you are missing a verb. Consider adding it.
